title: Get started
code: # Create a data frame with some example records df <- tibble::tribble(   ~name,    ~postcode,   "SCC",    "S1 2HH",   "Blades", "S2 4SU",   "Owls",   "S6 1SW" )  add_postcode_vars(   df,   pcd_name = "postcode",   .admin_district = FALSE,   .lat_long = TRUE,   other_vars = c("admin_ward", "msoa_code") )

what: Tools To Help With Address Data
title: Tools To Help With Address Data
text: addrsheff R package. goal help address data e.g. postcodes.

title: Tools To Help With Address Data
text: can install development version addrsheff GitHub : work Sheffield City Council can install binary package Windows : S:\BI Team\ShareToAll\RPackages Using RStudio can via Tools > Install packages… menu.

title: Tools To Help With Address Data
text: package currently just one function add_postcode_vars(). Pass data frame postcode column, specify variables e.g. Ward, add passed data frame return . Valid variable names listed “Available Data Fields” postcodes.io/docs.
code: library(addrsheff)  # Create a data frame with some example records df <- tibble::tribble(   ~name,    ~postcode,   "SCC",    "S1 2HH",   "Blades", "S2 4SU",   "Owls",   "S6 1SW" )  add_postcode_vars(   df,   pcd_name = "postcode",   .admin_district = FALSE,   .lat_long = TRUE,   other_vars = c("admin_ward", "msoa_code") )

title: Tools To Help With Address Data
text: add_postcode_vars() function depends PostcodesioR package postcodes.io free postcode geolocation API UK. package built using fusen.

what: Add postcode variables e.g. Ward, to a data frame with postcodes — add_postcode_vars

title: Add postcode variables e.g. Ward, to a data frame with postcodes — add_postcode_vars
code: add_postcode_vars(   df,   pcd_name = "postcode",   .admin_district = TRUE,   .lat_long = FALSE,   other_vars = character(0) )

title: Add postcode variables e.g. Ward, to a data frame with postcodes — add_postcode_vars
text: df data frame postcode variable pcd_name name postcode variable passed data frame .admin_district boolean indicating whether add admin_district variable .lat_long boolean indicating whether add pair latitude & longitude variables other_vars character vector variables add

title: Add postcode variables e.g. Ward, to a data frame with postcodes — add_postcode_vars
text: data frame variables added based postcode
